transcript: we only own a car it's the only thing we own that's not an investment we rent the place that we're in costs a nominal amount of money compared to our income if we want to spend six months in Cabo we can do that Layla for example loves having designer clothes and for me I care less about that we just try and optimize towards the things that we get marginal utility from we eat out every night we probably spend more on food than we do on rent that's how we get out so it works for us some people they want to eat peanut butter jelly sandwiches every day more power to you
